```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gapminder)
library(gganimate)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
continent_levels <- c("Americas", "Africa", "Asia", "Europe", "Oceania")
gapminder$continent <- gapminder$continent %>% factor(levels = continent_levels)

gapminder %>% 
  filter(continent %in% c("Americas", "Africa", "Asia")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, size = pop, color = country, alpha = 0.7)) + 
    geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
    scale_x_log10(labels = c("$1,000", "$10,000"), breaks = c(1000, 10000)) +
    facet_wrap(~ continent) +
    scale_color_manual(values = country_colors) +
    labs(title = "The World Gets Better Every Year",
         x = "GDP Per Capita",
         y = "Life Expectancy") +
    transition_time(year)
```
